price: 33. Nous avons produit devant eux des prodiges qui devaient leur être des épreuves manifestes.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
